title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Aaron Donald getting a massive contract extension to make him the highest paid non-QB in league history and what this tells us about the Rams front office. He defends Phil Mickelson and Dustin Johnson's decision to leave the PGA Tour and join the LIV Tour for large sums of money. He also believes the Ravens have been left with no choice but to give in and pay Lamar Jackson whatever he wants in his next contract. Plus, NBA Insider Chris Mannix joins the show to explain which player will have the biggest impact if the Celtics hope to win the NBA championship. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
